EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-0530-AI-Optimize-Kubernetes.ES-2018-05-10-Kubernetes-Follow-Up.ES-2
EmailTemplate.subject: Great meeting you at KubeCon Copenhagen!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Great meeting you at KubeCon+Cloud NativeCon in Copenhagen! Aside from having the longest lasting spinners and the best KubeCon cheerleader, we also have the only platform that enables your Kubernetes clusters to self-manage, whether you're on-prem or in the cloud.
Want to learn more about how Turbonomic's AI-powered decision engine continuously optimizes Kubernetes environments?
Join our live webinar Self-Managing Kubernetes <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]> Wednesday, May 30th at 11 am ET
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>
Today's solutions offer more data, visibility, and automation. What's missing is a decision engine that uses that data to determine what to do and when to do it and leverages that automation to execute those actions in real-time. That's where Turbonomic comes in...
- Minimal human intervention
- Automated rescheduling of pods assures performance
- Intelligent cluster scaling ensures elastic infrastructure
- Full-stack control unites DevOps and infrastructure
Save your seat here. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]> Hope to see you then!
Cheers, The Turbonomic Team © Turbonomic, Inc.
